original_text: And furthermore, that ye have sent for men to come from far, unto whom a messenger was sent; and, lo, they came: for whom thou didst wash thyself, paintedst thy eyes, and deckedst thyself with ornaments,
korean_text: 또 사절을 먼 곳에 보내 사람을 불러오게 하고 그들이 오매 그들을 위하여 목욕하며 눈썹을 그리며 스스로 단장하고

sentences.original_text: that ye have sent for men to come from far
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 먼 곳에서 올 사람들을 보내달라고 했으며

sentences.original_text: unto whom a messenger was sent
for whom thou didst wash thyself
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들을 위해 네 자신을 씻었고
